title: Demons and Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/23/19
itunes:title: Demons and Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/23/19
description:
George Noory and occult expert Michelle Belanger discuss her work fighting demons, the stance of the Catholic church regarding exorcisms, and how some people get targeted for demonic possession.
